name: ContainerStructureTest
description: Runs Container structure tests using Google container structure test framework
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: testFile
inputs.label: Test Files
inputs.helpMarkDown: Test files path, that contains container structure tests. Either .yaml or .json files

messages.NoMatchingFilesFound: No test files matching '%s' were found.
messages.ErrorFailTaskOnFailedTests: There are one or more test failures detected in test. Detailed summary of published test results can be viewed in the Tests tab.
